BioinformaticsÔÉÅ

Descriptions on how to process Illumina paired-end data of different amplicons.

  • Arthropods/COI
    • Remove primers
    • Quality filtering
    • Denoise and merge paired-end reads
    • Remove chimeras
    • Remove tag-jumps
    • Merge sequencing runs
    • Remove NUMTs
    • Taxonomy assignment
    • Remove non-Metazoa
    • Clustering
  • Fungi/ITS
    • Remove primers
    • Quality filtering
    • Denoise and merge paired-end reads
    • Remove chimeras
    • Remove tag-jumps
    • Merge sequencing runs
    • Extract ITS2 region
    • Taxonomy assignment
    • Clustering
  • Bacteria/16S
    • Starting point
    • Remove primers
    • Quality filtering
    • Denoise and merge paired-end reads
    • Remove chimeras
    • Remove tag-jumps
    • Merge sequencing runs
    • Taxonomy assignment
    • Clustering
